sources.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<dfasdl xmlns="http://www.dfasdl.org/DFASDL" semantic="custom">
  <seq id="wp_commentmeta">
    <elem id="wp_commentmeta_row">
      <num db-column-name="meta_id" id="wp_commentmeta_row_meta_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_commentmeta_row_comment_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_key" id="wp_commentmeta_row_meta_key" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_value" id="wp_commentmeta_row_meta_value"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_comments" db-select="SELECT t1 . * , t2.post_type FROM  `wp_comments` AS t1 LEFT JOIN  `wp_posts` AS t2 ON comment_post_ID = ID">
    <elem id="wp_comments_row">
      <num db-column-name="comment_id" id="wp_comments_row_comment_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_post_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_row_comment_post_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author" id="wp_comments_row_comment_author" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_email" id="wp_comments_row_comment_author_email" max-length="100"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_url" id="wp_comments_row_comment_author_url" max-length="200"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_ip" id="wp_comments_row_comment_author_ip" max-length="100"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="comment_date" id="wp_comments_row_comment_date"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="comment_date_gmt" id="wp_comments_row_comment_date_gmt"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_content" id="wp_comments_row_comment_content" max-length="65535"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_karma" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_row_comment_karma" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_approved" defaultstr="1" id="wp_comments_row_comment_approved" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_agent" id="wp_comments_row_comment_agent" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_type" id="wp_comments_row_comment_type" max-length="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_parent" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_row_comment_parent" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="user_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_row_user_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_type" id="wp_comments_row_post_type"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_comments_count" db-select="SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.* FROM wp_comments AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN wp_comments AS t2 ON t1.comment_post_ID = t2.comment_post_ID AND (t1.comment_date < t2.comment_date) OR (t1.comment_date = t2.comment_date AND t1.comment_ID < t2.comment_ID) WHERE t2.comment_post_ID IS NULL ) as lastValues LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment_post_ID, count(comment_post_ID) AS comment_count FROM wp_comments GROUP BY comment_post_ID ) AS commentCounted ON lastValues.comment_post_ID = commentCounted.comment_post_ID">
    <elem id="wp_comments_count_row">
      <num db-column-name="comment_id" id="wp_comments_count_row_cid" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_post_ID" id="wp_comments_count_row_nid" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_name" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_email" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_email" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_url" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_url" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_IP" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_IP" max-length="255"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="comment_date" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_timestamp"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="comment_date_gmt" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_date_gmt"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_author_IP" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_content"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_karma" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_karma" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_approved" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_approved" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_agent" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_agent" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_type" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_type" max-length="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_parent" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_parent" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="user_id" id="wp_comments_count_row_last_comment_uid" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_post_ID" id="wp_comments_count_row_nid2" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_count" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_count_row_comment_count" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_comments_count_nuller" db-select="SELECT ID AS nid, 0 AS cid, MAX(post_date) AS last_comment_timestamp, MAX(comment_author) AS last_comment_name, MAX(post_author) AS last_comment_uid, 0 AS comment_count FROM wp_posts LEFT JOIN wp_comments ON ( ID = comment_post_ID )  WHERE post_type =  'post' OR post_type =  'page' GROUP BY ID HAVING last_comment_name IS NULL">
    <elem id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row">
      <num db-column-name="nid" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_nid" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="cid" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_cid" max-digits="20"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="last_comment_timestamp" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_last_comment_timestamp"/>
      <str db-column-name="last_comment_name" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_last_comment_name" max-length="255"/>
      <num db-column-name="last_comment_uid" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_last_comment_uid" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_count" defaultnum="0" id="wp_comments_count_nuller_row_comment_count" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_links">
    <elem id="wp_links_row">
      <num db-column-name="link_id" id="wp_links_row_link_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_url" id="wp_links_row_link_url" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_name" id="wp_links_row_link_name" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_image" id="wp_links_row_link_image" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_target" id="wp_links_row_link_target" max-length="25"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_description" id="wp_links_row_link_description" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_visible" defaultstr="Y" id="wp_links_row_link_visible" max-length="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="link_owner" defaultnum="1" id="wp_links_row_link_owner" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="link_rating" defaultnum="0" id="wp_links_row_link_rating" max-digits="11"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="link_updated" id="wp_links_row_link_updated"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_rel" id="wp_links_row_link_rel" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_notes" id="wp_links_row_link_notes" max-length="16777215"/>
      <str db-column-name="link_rss" id="wp_links_row_link_rss" max-length="255"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_options">
    <elem id="wp_options_row">
      <num db-column-name="option_id" id="wp_options_row_option_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="option_name" id="wp_options_row_option_name" max-length="64"/>
      <str db-column-name="option_value" id="wp_options_row_option_value"/>
      <str db-column-name="autoload" defaultstr="yes" id="wp_options_row_autoload" max-length="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_postmeta">
    <elem id="wp_postmeta_row">
      <num db-column-name="meta_id" id="wp_postmeta_row_meta_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="post_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_postmeta_row_post_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_key" id="wp_postmeta_row_meta_key" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_value" id="wp_postmeta_row_meta_value"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_posts" filter="post_type = 'post' OR post_type = 'page'">
    <elem id="wp_posts_row">
      <num db-column-name="id" id="wp_posts_row_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="post_author" defaultnum="0" id="wp_posts_row_post_author" max-digits="20"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="post_date" id="wp_posts_row_post_date"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="post_date_gmt" id="wp_posts_row_post_date_gmt"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_content" id="wp_posts_row_post_content"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_title" id="wp_posts_row_post_title" max-length="65535"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_excerpt" id="wp_posts_row_post_excerpt" max-length="65535"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_status" defaultstr="publish" id="wp_posts_row_post_status" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="comment_status" defaultstr="open" id="wp_posts_row_comment_status" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="ping_status" defaultstr="open" id="wp_posts_row_ping_status" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_password" id="wp_posts_row_post_password" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_name" id="wp_posts_row_post_name" max-length="200"/>
      <str db-column-name="to_ping" id="wp_posts_row_to_ping" max-length="65535"/>
      <str db-column-name="pinged" id="wp_posts_row_pinged" max-length="65535"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="post_modified" id="wp_posts_row_post_modified"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="post_modified_gmt" id="wp_posts_row_post_modified_gmt"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_content_filtered" id="wp_posts_row_post_content_filtered"/>
      <num db-column-name="post_parent" defaultnum="0" id="wp_posts_row_post_parent" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="guid" id="wp_posts_row_guid" max-length="255"/>
      <num db-column-name="menu_order" defaultnum="0" id="wp_posts_row_menu_order" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_type" defaultstr="post" id="wp_posts_row_post_type" max-length="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="post_mime_type" id="wp_posts_row_post_mime_type" max-length="100"/>
      <num db-column-name="comment_count" defaultnum="0" id="wp_posts_row_comment_count" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_term_fields" db-select="SELECT t1.object_id AS node_id, t1.term_taxonomy_id AS term_id, t2.taxonomy AS contype FROM wp_term_relationships AS t1 LEFT JOIN wp_term_taxonomy AS t2 ON (t1.term_taxonomy_id = t2.term_id)">
    <elem id="wp_term_fields_row">
      <num db-column-name="node_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_fields_row_node_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_fields_row_term_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="contype" id="wp_term_fields_row_contype"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_terms">
    <elem id="wp_terms_row">
      <num db-column-name="term_id" id="wp_terms_row_term_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="name" id="wp_terms_row_name" max-length="200"/>
      <str db-column-name="slug" id="wp_terms_row_slug" max-length="200"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_group" defaultnum="0" id="wp_terms_row_term_group" max-digits="10"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_terms_categories" db-select="SELECT t1.*, t2.description, t2.parent FROM wp_terms AS t1 LEFT JOIN wp_term_taxonomy AS t2 ON (t1.term_id = t2.term_id) WHERE t2.taxonomy = 'category'">
    <elem id="wp_terms_categories_row">
      <num db-column-name="term_id" id="wp_terms_categories_row_term_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="name" id="wp_terms_categories_row_name" max-length="200"/>
      <str db-column-name="slug" id="wp_terms_categories_row_slug" max-length="200"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_group" defaultnum="0" id="wp_terms_categories_row_term_group" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="description" id="wp_terms_categories_row_description"/>
      <num db-column-name="parent" id="wp_terms_categories_row_parent" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_terms_tags" db-select="SELECT t1.*, t2.description, t2.parent FROM wp_terms AS t1 LEFT JOIN wp_term_taxonomy AS t2 ON (t1.term_id = t2.term_id)">
    <elem id="wp_terms_tags_row">
      <num db-column-name="term_id" id="wp_terms_tags_row_term_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="name" id="wp_terms_tags_row_name" max-length="200"/>
      <str db-column-name="slug" id="wp_terms_tags_row_slug" max-length="200"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_group" defaultnum="0" id="wp_terms_tags_row_term_group" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="description" id="wp_terms_tags_row_description"/>
      <num db-column-name="parent" id="wp_terms_tags_row_parent" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_term_relationships">
    <elem id="wp_term_relationships_row">
      <num db-column-name="object_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_relationships_row_object_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_taxonomy_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_relationships_row_term_taxonomy_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_order" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_relationships_row_term_order" max-digits="11"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_term_taxonomy">
    <elem id="wp_term_taxonomy_row">
      <num db-column-name="term_taxonomy_id" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_term_taxonomy_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="term_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_term_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="taxonomy" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_taxonomy" max-length="32"/>
      <str db-column-name="description" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_description"/>
      <num db-column-name="parent" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_parent" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="count" defaultnum="0" id="wp_term_taxonomy_row_count" max-digits="20"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_usermeta">
    <elem id="wp_usermeta_row">
      <num db-column-name="umeta_id" id="wp_usermeta_row_umeta_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <num db-column-name="user_id" defaultnum="0" id="wp_usermeta_row_user_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_key" id="wp_usermeta_row_meta_key" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="meta_value" id="wp_usermeta_row_meta_value"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="wp_users">
    <elem id="wp_users_row">
      <num db-column-name="id" id="wp_users_row_id" max-digits="20"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_login" id="wp_users_row_user_login" max-length="60"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_pass" id="wp_users_row_user_pass" max-length="64"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_nicename" id="wp_users_row_user_nicename" max-length="50"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_email" id="wp_users_row_user_email" max-length="100"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_url" id="wp_users_row_user_url" max-length="100"/>
      <datetime db-column-name="user_registered" id="wp_users_row_user_registered"/>
      <str db-column-name="user_activation_key" id="wp_users_row_user_activation_key" max-length="60"/>
      <num db-column-name="user_status" defaultnum="0" id="wp_users_row_user_status" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="display_name" id="wp_users_row_display_name" max-length="250"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
</dfasdl>

target.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<dfasdl xmlns="http://www.dfasdl.org/DFASDL" semantic="custom">
  <seq id="actions">
    <elem id="actions_row">
      <str db-column-name="aid" defaultstr="0" id="actions_row_aid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="type" id="actions_row_type" max-length="32"/>
      <str db-column-name="callback" id="actions_row_callback" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="parameters" id="actions_row_parameters"/>
      <str db-column-name="label" defaultstr="0" id="actions_row_label" max-length="255"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="authmap">
    <elem id="authmap_row">
      <num db-column-name="aid" id="authmap_row_aid" max-digits="10"/>
      <num db-column-name="uid" defaultnum="0" id="authmap_row_uid" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="authname" id="authmap_row_authname" max-length="128"/>
      <str db-column-name="module" id="authmap_row_module" max-length="128"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="batch">
    <elem id="batch_row">
      <num db-column-name="bid" id="batch_row_bid" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="token" id="batch_row_token" max-length="64"/>
      <num db-column-name="timestamp" id="batch_row_timestamp" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="batch" id="batch_row_batch"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="block">
    <elem id="block_row">
      <num db-column-name="bid" id="block_row_bid" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="module" id="block_row_module" max-length="64"/>
      <str db-column-name="delta" defaultstr="0" id="block_row_delta" max-length="32"/>
      <str db-column-name="theme" id="block_row_theme" max-length="64"/>
      <num db-column-name="status" defaultnum="0" id="block_row_status" max-digits="4"/>
      <num db-column-name="weight" defaultnum="0" id="block_row_weight" max-digits="11"/>
      <str db-column-name="region" id="block_row_region" max-length="64"/>
      <num db-column-name="custom" defaultnum="0" id="block_row_custom" max-digits="4"/>
      <num db-column-name="visibility" defaultnum="0" id="block_row_visibility" max-digits="4"/>
      <str db-column-name="pages" id="block_row_pages" max-length="65535"/>
      <str db-column-name="title" id="block_row_title" max-length="255"/>
      <num db-column-name="cache" defaultnum="1" id="block_row_cache" max-digits="4"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="blocked_ips">
    <elem id="blocked_ips_row">
      <num db-column-name="iid" id="blocked_ips_row_iid" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="ip" id="blocked_ips_row_ip" max-length="40"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="block_custom">
    <elem id="block_custom_row">
      <num db-column-name="bid" id="block_custom_row_bid" max-digits="10"/>
      <str db-column-name="body" id="block_custom_row_body"/>
      <str db-column-name="info" id="block_custom_row_info" max-length="128"/>
      <str db-column-name="format" id="block_custom_row_format" max-length="255"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="block_node_type">
    <elem id="block_node_type_row">
      <str db-column-name="module" id="block_node_type_row_module" max-length="64"/>
      <str db-column-name="delta" id="block_node_type_row_delta" max-length="32"/>
      <str db-column-name="type" id="block_node_type_row_type" max-length="32"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="block_role">
    <elem id="block_role_row">
      <str db-column-name="module" id="block_role_row_module" max-length="64"/>
      <str db-column-name="delta" id="block_role_row_delta" max-length="32"/>
      <num db-column-name="rid" id="block_role_row_rid" max-digits="10"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="cache">
    <elem id="cache_row">
      <str db-column-name="cid" id="cache_row_cid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="data" id="cache_row_data"/>
      <num db-column-name="expire" defaultnum="0" id="cache_row_expire" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="created" defaultnum="0" id="cache_row_created" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="serialized" defaultnum="0" id="cache_row_serialized" max-digits="6"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="cache_block">
    <elem id="cache_block_row">
      <str db-column-name="cid" id="cache_block_row_cid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="data" id="cache_block_row_data"/>
      <num db-column-name="expire" defaultnum="0" id="cache_block_row_expire" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="created" defaultnum="0" id="cache_block_row_created" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="serialized" defaultnum="0" id="cache_block_row_serialized" max-digits="6"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="cache_bootstrap">
    <elem id="cache_bootstrap_row">
      <str db-column-name="cid" id="cache_bootstrap_row_cid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="data" id="cache_bootstrap_row_data"/>
      <num db-column-name="expire" defaultnum="0" id="cache_bootstrap_row_expire" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="created" defaultnum="0" id="cache_bootstrap_row_created" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="serialized" defaultnum="0" id="cache_bootstrap_row_serialized" max-digits="6"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="cache_field">
    <elem id="cache_field_row">
      <str db-column-name="cid" id="cache_field_row_cid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="data" id="cache_field_row_data"/>
      <num db-column-name="expire" defaultnum="0" id="cache_field_row_expire" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="created" defaultnum="0" id="cache_field_row_created" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="serialized" defaultnum="0" id="cache_field_row_serialized" max-digits="6"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
  <seq id="cache_filter">
    <elem id="cache_filter_row">
      <str db-column-name="cid" id="cache_filter_row_cid" max-length="255"/>
      <str db-column-name="data" id="cache_filter_row_data"/>
      <num db-column-name="expire" defaultnum="0" id="cache_filter_row_expire" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="created" defaultnum="0" id="cache_filter_row_created" max-digits="11"/>
      <num db-column-name="serialized" defaultnum="0" id="cache_filter_row_serialized" max-digits="6"/>
    </elem>
  </seq>
